医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
ASBMB 敦促政策制定者维持对 NIH 的资助7月19日，美国生物化学与分子生物学会发表声明，对众议院劳工、卫生与公众服务、教育及相关机构资助法案中提出的美国国立卫生研究院预算表示担忧。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/ASBMB-urges-policymakers-to-sustain-funding-for-NIH.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/ASBMB-urges-policymakers-to-sustain-funding-for-NIH.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2e8dc96a-4b05-4aef-92a9-b39e367e8482 Fri, 21 Jul 2023 14:10:18 -0400 ASBMB urges policymakers to sustain funding for NIH
KIPA 在预测三阴性乳腺癌化疗反应方面显示出希望贝勒医学院和合作机构的研究人员正在开发一种策略来预测三阴性乳腺癌 (TNBC) 对化疗的反应，这将是医生决定治疗方案的一个宝贵工具，以提高个体治疗的成功率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/KIPA-shows-promise-in-predicting-chemotherapy-response-in-triple-male-breast-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/KIPA-shows-promise-in-predicting-chemotherapy-response-in-triple-阴性-breast-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dfb069d6-0bad-4a45-a43d-0699737c1574 Fri, 21 Jul 2023 13:59:04 -0400 KIPA shows promise in predicting chemotherapy response in triple negative breast cancer
新化合物有望阻止乳腺癌转移利物浦大学的研究人员创造了一种生物医学化合物，有可能阻止乳腺癌的扩散。最近发表的一篇论文详细介绍了这些早期发现。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/New-compound-shows-promise-in-stopping-breast-cancer-metastasis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/New-compound-shows-promise-in-stopping-breast-cancer-metastasis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8497def0-2b1e-4d1b-a044-e36d78a55ca2 Fri, 21 Jul 2023 13:43:09 -0400 New compound shows promise in stopping breast cancer metastasis
研究人员发现核糖体如何调节蛋白质生产人体由数万亿个细胞组成，细胞内 60% 的能量专用于特定的分子机器。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/Researchers-discover-how-ribosomes-regulate- Protein-Production.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/Researchers-discover-how-ribosomes-regulate- Protein-Production.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d64be089-3a96-42ea-a8bd-411067ed4b4a Fri, 21 Jul 2023 13:29:13 -0400 Researchers discover how ribosomes regulate protein production
NHS 数据表明，39 周时引产可能会减少不良后果的不平等伦敦卫生与热带医学学院研究人员和合作伙伴的一项研究表明，NHS 数据表明，在 39 周时对妊娠无并发症的女性进行引产可能会减少不良后果的不平等。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/NHS-data-suggests-inducing-labor-at-39-weeks-may-reduce-inequalities-in-adverse-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/NHS-data-suggests-inducing-labor-at-39-weeks-may-reduce-inequalities-in-adverse-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c0c6a48a-db70-4830-b995-634421ca7bec Fri, 21 Jul 2023 12:59:36 -0400 NHS data suggests inducing labor at 39 weeks may reduce inequalities in adverse outcomes
人工智能可能在识别心血管疾病风险方面发挥关键作用心血管疾病是瑞典乃至全世界最常见的死亡原因之一。瑞典卡罗林斯卡学院的研究人员等现在发现，人工智能似乎在识别心血管疾病的风险方面发挥了作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/Artificial-intelligence-may-play-a-key-role-in-identifying-the-risk-of-cardioangio-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/Artificial-intelligence-may-play-a-key-role-in-identifying-the-risk-of-cardioangio-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=abab5e4b-5f2b-4073-af21-dd20c5987968 Fri, 21 Jul 2023 12:46:14 -0400 Artificial intelligence may play a key role in identifying the risk of cardiovascular disease
益生菌组合可降低中毒性休克综合征的发生率广泛分布的致病微生物金黄色葡萄球菌可以在全身的皮肤和粘膜上定植，特别是阴道和胃肠道。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/Probiotic-combination-could-reduce-incidence-of-毒-shock-syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/Probiotic-combination-could-reduce-incidence-of-毒-shock-syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9f95d9fe-993c-406c-aaa6-c99db5cf3d63 Fri, 21 Jul 2023 12:22:25 -0400 Probiotic combination could reduce incidence of toxic shock syndrome
研究人员发现 NFIC 分子可预防胰腺癌胰腺位于胃后面，负责管理我们体内的能量供应。它通过分泌负责葡萄糖（身体的主要燃料）的蛋白质（酶）来实现这一点，并在需要时以适量的量到达其他器官。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/Researchers-discover-NFIC-molecule-that-may-prevent-pancreatic-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/Researchers-discover-NFIC-molecule-that-may-prevent-pancreatic-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5717d8cd-9dc9-4b51-b76b-8c2e28b770b8 Fri, 21 Jul 2023 12:17:19 -0400 Researchers discover NFIC molecule that may prevent pancreatic cancer
长期新冠病毒感染后可能会影响大脑功能数年英国研究人员发现，患有包括脑雾在内的长期 COVID-19 症状的人在感染病毒后两年内，在测试不同心理过程的任务中表现出较差的表现。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/Long-COVID-can-affect-brain-function-for-years-after-infection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/Long-COVID-can-affect-brain-function-for-years-after-infection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=79362519-9c3b-4ee0-855a-218aa399402c Fri, 21 Jul 2023 12:11:11 -0400 Long COVID can affect brain function for years after infection
美国心脏协会投资心脏和大脑健康研究的未来来自美国各地的 100 多名科学家正在接受特别资助，以支持他们寻找对抗心脏病和中风的创新解决方案的研究工作。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/American-Heart-Association-invests-in-the-future-of-heart-and-brain-health-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/American-Heart-Association-invests-in-the-future-of-heart-and-brain-health-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=820a4dd2-55fc-43fc-a9b1-23ea92b10689 Fri, 21 Jul 2023 11:54:36 -0400 American Heart Association invests in the future of heart and brain health research
